@graph.caption: Potato and chorizo tacos. Serve the crispy bits of spicy chorizo mixed with the slightly golden potatoes on a warm tortilla and top with salsa.

@graph.name: Vegan Potato and Chorizo Tacos « Dora's Table
@graph.description: Vegan Potato and Chorizo Tacos, crispy bits of spicy chorizo mixed with tslightly golden potatoes on a warm tortilla and topped with salsa.

@graph.name: Dora S.
@graph.description: Dora is the founder, recipe developer, and photographer at Dora's Table and Mi Mero Mole. Born and raised in Mexico and a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America in New York, she adopted a vegan (plant-based) diet to take control of her health.

@graph.name: Potato and Chorizo Tacos
@graph.description: Potatoes and chorizo or chorizo con papas is traditionally a breakfast dish, but I see no reason why this couldn't be a good lunch or dinner option.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbsp. of oil in a large sauté pan at medium-low heat. Add onions and cook until soft and translucent, about 10 min. It’s ok if they brown a little bit.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat 1 tbsp. of oil in a large sauté pan at medium-low heat. Add onions and cook until soft and translucent, about 10 min. It’s ok if they brown a little bit.

recipeInstructions.text: While the onions are cooking, place your cut potatoes in a small saucepot with salted water. Bring the water up to a simmer at high heat. Lower heat to medium and let the potatoes cook for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: While the onions are cooking, place your cut potatoes in a small saucepot with salted water. Bring the water up to a simmer at high heat. Lower heat to medium and let the potatoes cook for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the potatoes and add them to the pan with the onion. Turn heat up to medium-high. Cook potatoes and onions for 5 minutes or until the potatoes begin to brown. Add more oil if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the potatoes and add them to the pan with the onion. Turn heat up to medium-high. Cook potatoes and onions for 5 minutes or until the potatoes begin to brown. Add more oil if necessary.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cooked chorizo to the pan and mix well. Cook for one more minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cooked chorizo to the pan and mix well. Cook for one more minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with warm tortillas and the salsa of your choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with warm tortillas and the salsa of your choice.

@graph.keywords: breakfast tacos, potato chorizo tacos, potato tacos, vegan tacos, vegetarian tacos
